title: #1502 I'm A Pre-Ignorer
itunes:title: #1502 I'm A Pre-Ignorer
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing their mutual love of 'Love Boat' and the Thanksgiving themed episode that has recently aired in honor of the holiday season. They then turn to the phones and speak with a caller who has been noticing a shift in language where things are becoming less precise. They also speak with an international caller who is interested in getting married and starting a family despite being single and looking for advice. They also speak with a few different callers with specific vaccine concerns looking for advice. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
BlindsGalore.com, tell them we sent you
